name: The Helping Hand Paradox
description:
You are in the middle of the woods because you left the city for a few days, hours away from any sign of civilization, trying to take a breath.

You heard a scream in the distance, there is a woman screaming for help in the area. After following the screams you encountered a secret door in the ground, covered with dirt and leaves, it wasn’t locked.

Only armed with a lighter, you entered to a room filled with objects. After lighting an old lantern you found a door secured with a sturdy lock. You can hear the woman sobbing in the locked room.

Maybe there is someway to open the door…

"The Helping Hand Paradox" is a short horror-puzzle randomize game that has many ways to solve the main puzzle and 2 endings.
It was made for the 48-hours "Haunted PS1 Wretched Weekend 1" jam.
